original: Kalhaṇa: Ardhanārīśvarastotra
analyzed: kalhaṇa ardhanārīśvarastotra

original: bhālaṃ vahniśikhāṅkitaṃ dadhad adhiśrotraṃ vahan saṃbhṛtakrīḍatkuṇḍalijṛmbhitaṃ jaladhijacchāyācchakaṇṭhacchaviḥ /
analyzed: bhālam vahni śikhā aṅkitam dadhat adhi śrotram vahan saṃbhṛta krīḍat kuṇḍali jṛmbhitam jaladhi ja chāyā accha kaṇṭha chaviḥ

original: vakṣo bibhrad ahīnakañcukacitaṃ baddhāṅganārdhasya vo bhāgaḥ puṃgavalakṣmaṇo 'stu yaśase vāmo 'tha vā dakṣiṇaḥ // 1 [= RT 1.2] //
analyzed: vakṣaḥ bibhrat ahīna kañcuka citam baddha aṅganā ardhasya vaḥ bhāgaḥ puṃgava lakṣmaṇaḥ astu yaśase vā dakṣiṇaḥ

original: vāme sāñjanam akṣi dakṣiṇadiśi śyāmāyamāno galaḥ pāṇau tiṣṭhati darpaṇo 'tra mukuṭe 'mutra sthitaś candramāḥ /
analyzed: vāme sa añjanam akṣi dakṣiṇa diśi śyāmāyamānaḥ galaḥ pāṇau tiṣṭhati mukuṭe mutra sthitaḥ candramāḥ

original: tan māteyam ayaṃ piteti sucirāt sapratyabhijñaṃ śanair yasyotsaṅgam agād guho bhavatu vaḥ prītyai sa gaurīśvaraḥ // 2 //
analyzed: tat mātā iyam ayam pitā iti su cirāt sa pratyabhijñam śanais yasya utsaṅgam agāt guhaḥ bhavatu vaḥ prītyai sa gaurīśvaraḥ  /

original: muñcebhājinam asya kumbhakuhare muktāḥ kucāgrocitāḥ kiṃ bhālajvalanena kajjalam ataḥ kāryaṃ tavākṣṇoḥ kṛte /
analyzed: muñca ibha ajinam asya kumbha kuhare muktāḥ kuca agra ucitāḥ kim bhāla jvalanena kajjalam atas kāryam tava akṣṇoḥ kṛte

original: saṃdhāne vapurardhayor bhagavator itthaṃ niṣedhe 'py aheḥ kartavye priyayottarānusaraṇodyukto haraḥ pātu vaḥ // 3 [= RT 3.1] //
analyzed: saṃdhāne vapuḥ ardhayoḥ bhagavatoḥ ittham niṣedhe pi aheḥ kartavye priyayā uttara anusaraṇa udyuktaḥ haraḥ pātu vaḥ

original: vihitam ajagośṛṅgāgrābhyāṃ dhanur ghaṭitaṃ tathā narakaraṭinor dehārdhābhyāṃ gaṇaṃ parigṛhṇataḥ /
analyzed: vihitam aja go śṛṅga agrābhyām dhanuḥ ghaṭitam tathā nara karaṭinoḥ deha ardhābhyām gaṇam parigṛhṇataḥ

original: dvividharacanāvāllabhyānāṃ nidher ucitā vibhor jayati laṭabhāpuṃbhāgābhyāṃ śarīravinirmitiḥ // 4 [= RT 2.1] //
analyzed: dvividha racanāvān labhyānām nidheḥ ucitā vibhoḥ jayati laṭabhā puṃbhāgābhyām śarīra vinirmitiḥ

original: nedaṃ parṇasamīraṇāśanatapomāhātmyam ukṣoragau paśyaitāv ata eva saṃprati kṛtau tanmātravṛttī bahiḥ /
analyzed: na idam parṇa samīraṇa aśana tapaḥ māhātmyam ukṣa uragau paśya etau atas eva saṃprati kṛtau tanmātra vṛttī bahis

original: premṇaivārdham idaṃ carācaraguroḥ prāpeyam ātmastutīr itthaṃ devavadhūmukhāc chrutisukhāḥ śṛṇvaty aparṇāvatāt // 5 [= RT 6.1] //
analyzed: premṇā eva ardham idam carācara guroḥ prāpeyam ātma stutīḥ ittham deva vadhū mukhāt śruti sukhāḥ śṛṇvati aparṇāvatāt

original: kāpy eteṣu ruciḥ kaceṣu phaṇināṃ puṃskokilasyeva te gobhiḥ kaṇṭhataṭasya hṛṣyati puro dṛk paśya cakṣuḥśruteḥ /
analyzed: kā api eteṣu ruciḥ kaceṣu phaṇinām puṃskokilasya iva te gobhiḥ kaṇṭha taṭasya hṛṣyati puras   paśya cakṣuḥ śruteḥ

original: saṃdhāne 'bhinave mitho bhagavator jihvāpṛthakspandinī bhinnārthāṃ sadṛśākṣarām api vadanty evaṃ giraṃ pātu vaḥ // 6 [= RT 5.1] //
analyzed: saṃdhāne bhinave mithas bhagavatoḥ jihvā pṛthak spandinī bhinna arthām sadṛśa akṣarām api vadantī evam giram pātu vaḥ

original: dātuṃ vāñchati dakṣiṇe 'pi nayane vāmaḥ karaḥ kajjalaṃ bhaujaṅgaṃ ca bhuje 'ṅgadaṃ ghaṭayituṃ vāme 'pi vāmetaraḥ /
analyzed: dātum vāñchati dakṣiṇe nayane vāmaḥ karaḥ kajjalam bhaujaṅgam ca bhuje ṅgadam ghaṭayitum vāme vāma itaraḥ

original: itthaṃ svaṃ svam aśikṣitaṃ bhagavator ardhaṃ vapuḥ paśyatoḥ sādhārasmitalāñchitaṃ diśatu vo vaktraṃ manovāñchitam // 7 //
analyzed: ittham svam svam a śikṣitam bhagavatoḥ ardham vapuḥ paśyatoḥ sa ādhāra smita lāñchitam diśatu vaḥ vaktram manaḥ vāñchitam  /

original: gāḍhāliṅgana maṅgalaṃ bhavatu te svasty astu vaś cāṭavaḥ kiṃ brūmaḥ priyayā vilāsakalaha śraddheya evāsi na /
analyzed: gāḍha āliṅgana maṅgalam bhavatu te svasti astu vaḥ ca āṭavaḥ kim brūmaḥ priyayā vilāsa kalaha śraddheyaḥ evā asi na

original: ity ukte nibiḍapravāsacakitair yāvad guṇaiḥ sthīyate saṃghaṭṭaḥ śivayoḥ sa tāvad adhikaspaṣṭaḥ śivāyāstu vaḥ // 8 //
analyzed: iti ukte nibiḍa pravāsa cakitaiḥ yāvat guṇaiḥ sthīyate saṃghaṭṭaḥ śivayoḥ sa tāvat adhika spaṣṭaḥ śivāyāḥ tu vaḥ  /

original: tad ardhanārīśvaramūrdharatnam ardhaṃ vidhor astu samṛddhaye vaḥ /
analyzed: tat ardhanārīśvara mūrdha ratnam ardham vidhoḥ astu samṛddhaye vaḥ

original: yad adrikanyāvadanātiriktadvitīyabhāgabhramam ātanoti // 9 //
analyzed: yat adri kanyā vadana atirikta dvitīya bhāga bhramam ātanoti

original: tadvītavyatirekam adritanayādehena miśrībhavan niṣpratyūham iha vyapohatu vapuḥ sthāṇor abhadrāṇi vaḥ /
analyzed: tad vīta vyatirekam adri tanayā dehena miśrībhavat niṣpratyūham iha vyapohatu vapuḥ sthāṇoḥ abhadrāṇi vaḥ

original: veṇyā bhogivadhūśarīrakuṭilaśyāmatviṣā veṣṭitā jūṭāher api yatra bhāti dayitāmūrtyeva pṛktā tanuḥ // 10 [= RT 4.1] //
analyzed: veṇyā bhogi vadhū śarīra kuṭila śyāma tviṣā veṣṭitā jūṭāheḥ api yatra bhāti dayitā mūrtyā iva pṛktā tanuḥ

original: prauḍhāḥ kañcukino jaradvṛṣavaraḥ kubjas tuṣāradyutir nityāpto 'pi bahiṣkṛtaḥ parikaraḥ so 'yaṃ samasto 'py aho /
analyzed: prauḍhāḥ kañcukinaḥ jarat vṛṣa varaḥ kubjaḥ tuṣāra dyutiḥ bahiṣkṛtaḥ parikaraḥ saḥ yam aho

original: ardhād yadvasatīkṛtād bhagavatā cāritracaryāvidā sā bhidyād duritaṃ carācaraguror antaḥpuraṃ pārvatī // 11 [= RT 8.1] //
analyzed: ardhāt yadvasatīkṛtāt bhagavatā cāritra caryā vidā sā bhidyāt duritam carācara guroḥ antaḥpuram pārvatī

original: līlodyānavanaśmaśānagamane svecchāparādhīnayoḥ samyaksāmbaratādigambaradaśāsavrīḍanirvrīḍayoḥ /
analyzed: līlā udyāna vana śmaśāna gamane sva icchā para adhīnayoḥ samyak sa ambara tā digambara daśā sa vrīḍa nirvrīḍayoḥ

original: paryāptātularāmaṇīyakamahāśrībhairavākārayoḥ kṣemaṃ vaḥ śivayoḥ samāsamadṛśor diśyād acintyaṃ vapuḥ // 12 //
analyzed: paryāpta atula rāmaṇīyaka mahāśrībhairava ākārayoḥ kṣemam vaḥ śivayoḥ samāsama dṛśoḥ diśyāt acintyam vapuḥ  /

original: cūḍendor iva rociṣā mukulitaṃ vātāyanābhaṃ śriyaḥ pānārthaṃ pariṣevitaṃ madhukarākāraiḥ kumārānanaiḥ /
analyzed: cūḍa indoḥ iva rociṣā mukulitam vātāyana ābham śriyaḥ pāna artham pariṣevitam madhukara ākāraiḥ kumāra ānanaiḥ

original: aunnatyād adhivāsya vaktrapavanair ghrāṇopayogīkṛtaṃ kasyorojasarojam asti na manastoṣāya gaurīśayoḥ // 13 //
analyzed: aunnatyāt adhivāsya vaktra pavanaiḥ ghrāṇa upayogīkṛtam kasya ūroja sarojam asti na manaḥ toṣāya gaurīśayoḥ  /

original: ardhaṃ snigdhavimugdham iddhahutabhugdigdhaṃ tathārdhaṃ jagat pāyād īśvarayos tad akṣi tilakasthānasthitaṃ vīkṣya yat /
analyzed: ardham snigdha vimugdham iddha hutabhuj digdham tathā ardham jagat pāyāt īśvarayoḥ tat akṣi tilaka sthāna sthitam vīkṣya yat

original: krīḍākarmaṇi kārmukaṃ karatale kartuṃ kirīṭendunā sotsekaś ca nirutsukaś ca yugapad devaḥ smaro jāyate // 14 //
analyzed: krīḍā karmaṇi kārmukam kara tale kartum kirīṭa indunā sa utsekaḥ ca nirutsukaḥ ca yugapad devaḥ smaraḥ jāyate  /

original: vyālā vāyubhujas tṛṇeḍhi ca tṛṇāny ukṣā bubhukṣāturo niṣkaupīnapaṭaḥ kuṭumbabharaṇo kiṃ tv asmi cintākulaḥ /
analyzed: vyālāḥ vāyubhujaḥ ca tṛṇāni ukṣā bubhukṣā āturaḥ niṣkaupīna paṭaḥ kim tu asmi cintā ākulaḥ

original: daurgatyād iti piṇḍam ekam akarod gaurīśarūpeṇa yo yaś cābhīṣṭaphalapradas trijagataḥ kasmaicid asmai namaḥ // 15 //
analyzed: daurgatyāt iti piṇḍam ekam akarot gaurīśa rūpeṇa yaḥ yaḥ ca abhīṣṭa phala pradaḥ trijagataḥ kasmaicid asmai namaḥ  /

original: jyāghoṣair badhirīkaroti kakubho bāhū muhuḥ paśyati svasya svena vikatthate racayati proccaistarāṃ tarjanīm /
analyzed: jyā ghoṣaiḥ badhirīkaroti kakubhaḥ bāhū muhur paśyati svasya svena vikatthate racayati proccaistarām tarjanīm

original: yasmin kevalam eva kelirabhasāj jāte 'rdhanārīśvare vīraṃmanyatayā sa manmathabhaṭo vātūlitas taṃ stumaḥ // 16 //
analyzed: yasmin kevalam eva keli rabhasāt jāte ṛdha nārīśvare vīraṃmanya tayā sa manmatha bhaṭaḥ vātūlitaḥ tam stumaḥ  /

original: vapuḥkhaṇḍe khaṇḍaḥ prativasati śailendraduhituḥ śikhaṇḍe khaṇḍenduḥ svayam api vibhuḥ khaṇḍaparaśuḥ /
analyzed: vapuḥ khaṇḍe khaṇḍaḥ prativasati śailendra duhituḥ śikhaṇḍe khaṇḍenduḥ svayam api vibhuḥ khaṇḍaparaśuḥ

original: tathāpi pratyagraṃ śaraṇam upayātaṃ prati vibhor akhaṇḍo vyāpāro jagati karuṇāyā vijayate // 17 [= SKA 15.37] //
analyzed: tathā api pratyagram śaraṇam upayātam prati vibhoḥ akhaṇḍaḥ vyāpāraḥ jagati karuṇāyāḥ vijayate

original: premnārdhaṃ vapuṣo vilokya militaṃ devyā samaṃ svāmino maulau yasya niśāpatir nagasutāveṇīniśāmiśritaḥ /
analyzed: premnā ardham vapuṣaḥ vilokya militam devyā samam svāminaḥ maulau yasya niśāpatiḥ nagasutā veṇī niśā miśritaḥ

original: āste svāmyanuvartanārtham iva tat kṛtvā vapuḥ khaṇḍitaṃ deyād advayabhāvanāṃ sa bhagavān devo 'rdhanārīśvaraḥ // 18 [= ŚRT 1.1.2] //
analyzed: āste svāmi anuvartana artham iva tat kṛtvā vapuḥ khaṇḍitam deyāt advaya bhāvanām sa bhagavān devaḥ rdhanārīśvaraḥ
